website_summaries.verdict: Router offers excellent build quality, featuring a powerful motor that can handle a variety of jobs.
pros: Includes a 1.75 horsepower motor for excellent performance levels, even when you're working on hardwoods
Allows for bit depth adjustments up to 1/64th of an inch
Collet on the router will accept multiple shank bits
Good quality of work for a handheld router
cons: Creates more noise than some other handheld router options

customer_reviews.title: Cocentricity gauge NOT included!
customer_reviews.text: Product description states "Sub-base concentricity gauge included to ensure bit concentricity for best-in-class accuracy." False statement - it's not included and costs another $11.65 on Prime, so Amazon's price isn't as good as it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Renovator

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Threading - Broke Immediately
customer_reviews.text: No problems getting it out of the box. Seems like a very rugged unit. My issue is one that I other another buyer ran into (Read on the Dewalt site.). After placing the router bit into the collet, I noticed the bit was loose. I tightened it a bit more. Turned the unit on and the bit fell out. Literally in a couple of seconds. When I undid the nut, I saw that it has stripped. I now have a useless router. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: G Buchsen

customer_reviews.title: A dynamite router for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A dynamite router. Some difficulty in getting the circular attachment to line up with my Bosch router table, so beware. The router has incredibly accurate adjustments and the adjustment up and down is very simple and smooth. Changing bits is easy, it does require the two wrenches included, but the task is a simple snap each way. The router does not vibrate much either; the motor adjustments for speed are easy to reach under my router table. It has ample power to cut easily through oak and maple without burning the wood. This isn't a lightweight router; it's full size and full weight. I highly recommend this router.
customer_reviews.author: Yarburger

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Easy to Use, However......
customer_reviews.text: I love this router, however, have been frustrated with the adjustment ring. Regarless of how tight I set the adjustment lock, the adjustment ring will become lose when routering resulting in sudden bit drops of 1/16 to 1/8 inch. I understand I may have a lemon but after buying new and experiencing immediate problems, I was suprised that Dewalt's solution was ship the product to their repair center rather then provide me with a new one. I plan to secure the ring with tape and keep using for a couple weeks until my projects are completed before sending in for repair.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pippel

customer_reviews.title: Works great/does not fit on router table
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this router. It may not be variable speed, but it cuts beautifully very low vibration and is very well-built. My only frustration is that it does not fit my router table. After removing the baseplate from the base, The exposed screw holes do not offer more than a single match up to my router table which is designed to be universal. It would be nice if they made an adapter base. Maybe they do, and I just can’t find it. In the meantime I fabricated one out of wood
customer_reviews.author: Armand

customer_reviews.title: Great product, small suggestions for product improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Does well. Easy to use. Could use a depth ruler to assess depth vs eyeballing the depth and using the guide as such, a guide vs an actual depth measure. No speed adjustment but did great on my custom made picnic table of red oak. Could use some instructions on how far to place bit into collet. Saw on YouTube not to insert all the way to avoid breaking bit. Small issues for a product that I’m very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: anthony d. sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: These are great routers; very robust. We run them all day 5 days a week, usually last for 2 - 3 years. We mount them in a table router config. Easy to accurately adjust height with precision.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Deadley

customer_reviews.title: Limited warranty?
customer_reviews.text: Used the router on a limited basis on small projects. It stopped working during a project with a piece coming out. Looked like a piece of a brush. Took it in to a dewalt service center while still under the 3 year limited warranty. Was disappointed with the $60 + repair bill. Worked great for a while but hoped for better support by the Dewalt brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wehrle

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, five stars.
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of choices for a router in this category, but I decided to spend a little more because I would be using it a lot more than my other tools. I've used this router for my wood projects many times in the last year and have never had a problem. I built a router table and mounted it underneath. No complaints, five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Slapshot

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Motor
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a router and didnt really know what to look for. This one was on sale during prime day so i thought for the brand it should be a good one. Turned it on and almost pissed my pants on how powerful this is. Definitely for heavy duty work. Tried to use this on making cutouts but may need a variable speed router for that
customer_reviews.author: Derek Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Variable speed up to 1/2 collet
customer_reviews.text: As I kep building my shop, I make more workstations for different operations. Very fair price for a quality product. Picked this router because I use bits to 1/2 inch and need to slow the speed down on the big diameter cutters. Check your router bits for top speed for same operation. This router will do the trick. My 3rd one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a handful of uses
customer_reviews.text: Used this router three or four times over the two years I’ve owned it. It started sparking and smelling like an electrical fire. Opened it up and two of the small one inch copper strips on the motor shaft broke off and were flying around inside. Guess that means I paid about fifty dollars per use and I have a job that needs finishing and will require me to buy a new router. I probably have 15 dewalt power tools but this kind of quality is very frustrating. I think I’m going to have to look at other brands now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Watts

customer_reviews.title: Quality DEWALT router
customer_reviews.text: The DEWALT router was a gift for my brother-in-law. He is working on a number of projects around his house and needed a quality, lightweight product that was user friendly. This router fit the bill! It arrived quickly and was well packaged. He has used it multiple times and been well pleased with the result. We would recommend this router for certain!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Less than 1 yr old, used 4 times. It gets hot and spits bits. Then after inspection I found the guides in the collet nut have broken and strip the threads on the main shaft...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and quiet router
customer_reviews.text: I own other Dewalt routers.. One of which is the DW618 with the kit that includes the plunge base and D handle etc.. This router is very similar to the DW 618 and this fits the plunge base and D handle that came with the DW618 kit perfectly.. This DW616 has a single speed VS the DW618 which has the variable speed and a bit more H.P... This is a fantastic router overall.. I think the 1-3/4 H.P. rating on this DW616 is very modest as it feels very stout, strong, and also surprisingly quiet when cutting.. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: steve m.

customer_reviews.title: Very good router for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty powerful for the price. I am pretty hard on my routers and this seems to be working just fine. It is well built, heavy/thick materials. The rubber handles have plenty of grip. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: devin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect router with good visibility
customer_reviews.text: Great router with easy viewing of bit when carving. Most smaller routers are not as open. Would be nice if it had a soft start since there is a kick when it starts up.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Broke down and cannot return
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in September. The second time we used it to carve a door, it broke down. Not sturdy. I cannot see a way to return this item. Do not buy from this seller and do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Table Mounted
customer_reviews.text: I had a craftsman router and table. The router finally crapped out. Had to make a new template for the Dewalt. Very good router for a fixed table other than it blowing all the sawdust up and out. Even with a vacuum mounted directly behind the bit, its not enough to over come the force of air being produced by the router. Sawdust everywhere. Easy to adjust height but wish there was a way to fine adjust the height once it is locked.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Senders

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Router
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router following the failure of the variable speed model after a few years of light use in the hope that it might be more reliable. I have several bases that fit this machine and I didn't want to just throw them away. Wish I could have just bought a new motor, but that cost more than the whole unit. I now find that I am just as happy with the single speed model, since there seems to be little point in running a router at less than full speed.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Short cord
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, nothing special to report. The only negative is that the power cord is on the short side. If using with an extension cord, that is not much of an issue. Oh, and I guess the fact that the cord detaches from the unit is a potential problem too!
customer_reviews.author: rvfHenderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. Powerful. Little bulky but you can get over that. Enjoyed working with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Dollaway

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to.  Not a Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Its alot cheaper to buy the plunge and fixed kit together. Not a good price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Androtaker

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: Great Router. I went with this router over the DW618 because I will primary be using it hand held. In addition, I prefer the fix speed as it its one lest thing to go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Raisanen

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Machining on collet seems odd
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Machining on collet seems odd. Turns hard and requires wrenches the whole time vs being able to turn the collet on by hand until the collet gets tight on the router bit shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Del Sawall

customer_reviews.title: This is the tool you need, unless you are plunge cutting.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful router with the option to run 1/2" or 1/4" shanks. GET A BAG!!
customer_reviews.author: W. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to drop down for bit changes(router table) powerful and quieter than some other routers I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: mannmade78

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I received it on time. If I had to buy again I would.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: love this router
customer_reviews.text: Have set it up into my router table. It is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Missing Collet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this awhile ago but due to circumstances I am just now getting it out and find the Collet is missing and it's $40+ to order the part.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Nupel

customer_reviews.title: 1-3/4-Horsepower Fixed Base Router
customer_reviews.text: I bought my DEWALT DW616 primarily to use in my router table. I installed it and it works perfect for what I need. What's nice is, I can remove it from my table and use it as a hand hold router. (I couldn't do that with the router that came with my table.) This router is more powerful and smaller than my old one. The only thing I would want changed would be an arbor lock. Two wrench bit replacement is clumsy,
customer_reviews.author: Woodart

customer_reviews.title: Be ready for disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It obvious that this was returned before. There are miss parts and wood dust all over the tool. Definitely not new. I'm over all disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Abbitt

customer_reviews.title: ... router in to a bosch router table it fit perfect and was a great combination
customer_reviews.text: I put this router in to a bosch router table it fit perfect and was a great combination.. The router it's self works really well and have no problem with bigger projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt does it again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of 3 Dewalt routers that I've purchased! I can not praise Dewalt enough for their quality of tools! They are (in my opinion) simply the best for the money! They have fantastic warranty and service and you probably won't even ever have to use it! If you're looking for a router,...get this one!
customer_reviews.author: ahoffoss

customer_reviews.title: I use it mainly for trim work and it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Basic hand held , it does its job. I use it mainly for trim work and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: CandC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, way better than the porter cable.. I have used both
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be mounted under table
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to mount this router for an under table application. WTF
customer_reviews.author: Tav

customer_reviews.title: I particularly like using it for edging detail and making pieces flush ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first router. It opened up a lot of possibilities with my projects that just weren't possible without it. I particularly like using it for edging detail and making pieces flush with a flush trim bit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good. Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. A nice soft start feature would have made it perfect though.
customer_reviews.author: Uinta Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Shorted Out After 2 weeks of useage
customer_reviews.text: I received this item quickly and it was working fine but the motor burned out on it within about 2 weeks worth of use. I had not even been using it on a daily basis. I am waiting to hear about a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: NatureMill, I.

customer_reviews.title: great value in a basic router
customer_reviews.text: Mounted in a router table, this router works well with quarter-inch and half-inch diameter bits.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gelinas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much smoother and more powerful than my old 1/4 inch router.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...  (if it came with bits)
customer_reviews.text: Good quality!! Table mount or portable. Wish bits were included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Got this specifically because it was on sale at christmas, and i needed a router that would use 1/2" and 1/4" bits. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Tucker

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought for simple hobbyist woodworking projects. Put into small homemade bench top router table. No complaints after first month. Works well with a variety of bits.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Rozak

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt 1 3/4 hp router
customer_reviews.text: Top quality router, bought it to fit router table and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Big Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is the most intimidating tool I own. I let go of a piece of wood I was working on accidentally and it rocketed through the air and smashed my car jack. Seeing the damage it did to birds eye maple really made me appreciate the power. Anyway, the tool is extremely useful for finishing and is very high quality. I wish it was variable speed since I mainly work with hardwood, I believe lower speeds would be more ideal to start working hardwood. Anyway, the locking cord, the detachable base, and power are all great. It is comfortable to use and very powerful. Great for a beginner in woodworking.
customer_reviews.author: Valtyr

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He likes Dewalt tools very much and this is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Dewalt router - others are plunge router and trim router. Really love the trim router. This Dewalt DW616 is perfect for use in the cnc machine. Like that it has an actual switch rather than a push button type switch. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Fired up
customer_reviews.text: Motor broke within 10 uses. Commutator came apart with sparks everywhere. Have not seen as bad of a quality yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Same tool , Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy I have found on this router. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Becky Olson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but will not plug into the Porter Cable router table switch box.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kerr

customer_reviews.title: quality router
customer_reviews.text: powerful router. quality construction. on/off switch is hard to get used to because my old router had it on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J

customer_reviews.title: Strong and compact
customer_reviews.text: I use this router freehand and in a table. It works well in both jobs. I do wish the power switch was more of a button as opposed to a flip on/off switch. Other than that it runs great and is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: Use this to make your own mouldings, trim on shelving and anything else that a nice, neat edge is required.
customer_reviews.author: cosmicthermos

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Meets or exceeds the Companies expectations for a product frequently used in a production enviroment. This item was well priced for the valu.
customer_reviews.author: John Schettko

customer_reviews.title: No issues and loving it!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this in our CNC for about two months now and have had no issues with it. As always, Dewalt is very reliable and this one has great power!
customer_reviews.author: MHKindle

customer_reviews.title: Was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Chose the router because of the brand and advertised features. I have used it frequently and am very satisfied with the performance and easy settings.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DW616 1-3/4-Horsepower Fixed Base Router
customer_reviews.text: I purchase it to use in a router lift. But the method of depth is great. I almost use the the other router but I did not purchased a plunge base with it.
customer_reviews.author: gordon

customer_reviews.title: Router is simple and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these already and bought another to use under my router table. Good simple router that is easy to change bits on.
customer_reviews.author: P. Read

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to mount under my router table. perfectly centered, more than powerful enough for the precision joinery work I am using it for. Exactly as advertised and going by my previous experience with DeWalt products, I anticipate many years of dependable and reliable service.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund J. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This router kicks butt everyday and twice on Sunday. Go get you one.
customer_reviews.author: John Langenstein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice! I little loud, but great spread and seems smooth
customer_reviews.author: Robb S Texas

customer_reviews.title: it is a GREAT tool for household and similar use
customer_reviews.text: Negatives first: the package was banged around, and looked as if it was on a shelf in a dusty warehouse for a LONG time. The plastic package holding the other contents looked as if it was opened and taped shut. Also, I thought that either a case or canvas-type bag was to have been included. Other than that, it is a GREAT tool for household and similar use. Have no idea on how it will hold up for a professional's heavy, continued daily use. The DeWalt quality is evident in every use I put the router through. I do not see how anyone requiring a router could go wrong with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: PaPaKC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice tool to own when you do a lot of finish carpentry.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I find it interesting that this router gets such good reviews. Dewalt is the go to brand for ...
customer_reviews.text: I find it interesting that this router gets such good reviews. Dewalt is the go to brand for my business, so when I needed routers I went with Dewalt. Unfortunately, three of four have failed; the motors have burned up. And we used these routers sparingly. I've been very satisfied with Dewalt tools in the past; however, I'm very disappointed in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Router
customer_reviews.text: the DEWALT router IS A SMOOTH running router I have owned several different routers but this the best. woukd recommend it to any one needing a router
customer_reviews.author: Carl P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome router. We use this model at work so I bought this one for home use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parfait

customer_reviews.title: great compact router
customer_reviews.text: did a good job but I wished it turned more RPMS I would recommend this router for anyone doing small jobs It also was priced right
customer_reviews.author: David Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this router. The bit changes are easy. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Randall

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this router highly
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this router highly. Easy to use. I had a different brand router that quit, thought I would try the DeWalt as I have drills by this brand. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Whie

customer_reviews.title: I love this router I use it about three times a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this router I use it about three times a week I am a trim carpenter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It is a great improvement over my 30 year old Sears. The directions are weird. I guess you neede to have used a more modern one to get the drift of how the parts adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Elevenz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it a whole lot but I really like it. It works good and is quiet. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hi quality woodworking tool with the dependability you would expect from Dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cremer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine! It works perfect for the job I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! It works perfect for the job I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: eliup

customer_reviews.title: It is a solid router. The base plate, ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid router. The base plate, that comes with the router, is indeed small and will only fit straight bits. The plate with a larger hole is $30 online. I drilled the original plate out with a hole saw to accommodate larger bits. Oddly enough the replacement for the original plate is only $6 online. Things that make you go hmm.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Won't accept round-over bits.
customer_reviews.text: This routers clear base has an opening only big enough for some small diameter bits. To use a common round over bit, I had to buy a different base for an additional $30! --for a simple clear plastic disc. Disappointing. I'm suspicious if this isn't intentional.
customer_reviews.author: island bum

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DW616 1-3/4-Horsepower Fixed Base Router
customer_reviews.text: This router has a simple height adjustment, accurate and secure. The tool is a delight to use and powerful as well.
customer_reviews.author: jOHN mCcORMICK

customer_reviews.title: Router is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have several routers and this replaced my 610 model that I used so much, but I built a new table so I used a base that needed a new router so I got the 616. I could have got the 618 but I really did not need the extra power. I have used the 1 3/4 HP routers for years and do most of my work with oak so keep a sharp bit and you will have no issues. Get one use it and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: John P. Fortunato

customer_reviews.title: Awesome router
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router because the one i had before burn out doing a very big job. I work at a finish carpentry company and we used a lot and this one i guest it past the test already because the next day that i got it i used it at the job site we were working and its really powerful the handles makes it easy to handle and the mottor it didnt got hot or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Juan pablo lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars just got it today been in transit to Australia
customer_reviews.author: Callan P Jozsef

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Building a vanity and my other router went out so I got this one and I like it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Kycastaway

customer_reviews.title: thank you
customer_reviews.text: he is happy with it so far. Hes know asking for more stuff for it lol lol lol lol lol
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Strong tool
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat for the price. 15 year finish carpenter. Great for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I had 4 of these routers. I burned up one (a lot of dust build up--my fault). This one replaced the one I burned up. Excellent router!
customer_reviews.author: Gerrod Hampel

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get the bit to stay because the machine was ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get the bit to stay because the machine was stripped. Wasn’t able to exchange for another one so now I’m stuck with a broken tool that’s never been used
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool, powerfull and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Julio Santillan

product_meta.title: DEWALT Router, Fixed Base, 1-3/4-HP (DW616)
product_meta.description:
Size:Pack of 1Route and smooth even demanding hardwoods with the 1-3/4 horsepower DEWALT DW616 fixed base router, which provides a micro-fine depth adjustment ring provides for precise depth adjustments in 1/64-inch increments. And the adjustable, tool-free steel motor cam lock makes depth adjustment and base changes quick and solid-locking. Do not hand-hold the router in an upside-down or horizontal position

AMAZON.COM


Route and smooth even demanding hardwoods with the 1-3/4 horsepower DEWALT DW616 fixed base router, which provides a micro-fine depth adjustment ring provides for precise depth adjustments in 1/64-inch increments. And the adjustable, tool-free steel motor cam lock makes depth adjustment and base changes quick and solid-locking.

The 1-3/4 horsepower DW616M motor pack 
(view larger). DW616 1-3/4-HORSEPOWER FIXED BASE ROUTER
AT A GLANCE:
 * 1-3/4 horsepower, 11.0 Amp motor
   
   
 * Adjustable, tool-free steel motor cam lock
   
   
 * Precise depth adjustments in 1/64-inch increments
   
   
 * Easily tackles even the toughest hardwoods
   
   
 * Three-year limited warranty; one-year free service

POWER AND PERFORMANCE
This kit's DW616M 1-3/4 horsepower, 11 amp motor provides all the power, durability, and versatility required on professional job sites. A dust-sealed switch protects against dust ingestion for longer switch life, and the motor housing is nickel plated for a smooth, long-lasting depth adjustment. 

With a micro-fine depth adjustment ring, you can count on accurate adjustment in 1/64-inch increments, while a clear, Lexan sub-base ensures durability, visibility, and the ability to accept standard template guide bushings. The included sub-base concentricity gauge enhances accuracy even further by helping you maintain bit concentricity, and long, eight-slot collets that are self-releasing provide excellent bit retention for dependability. 

COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE
A steel motor cam lock and quick-release motor latches make adjustments and base changes tool-free, fast and easy when you need to switch tasks, and a unique, detachable cordset helps keep this tool easy to service. The over-molded, rubber handles and well-balanced body will keep you working comfortably for hours. The unique switch and cordset configuration allows you to keep the switch in your right or left hand, and a flat top further increases to ease of bit and depth changes. 

WARRANTY
This DEWALT tool is backed by three-year limited warranty covering any defects due to faulty materials or workmanship (from the date of purchase). It's also covered by DEWALT's one-year free service contract, where DEWALT will maintain the tool and replace worn parts caused by normal use--for free.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
DEWALT DW616 fixed base router with DW616M motor pack; DW6184 fixed base; 1/4- and 1/2-inch collets, sub-base concentricity gauge; two wrenches; operating instructions

Micro-fine depth adjustment ring provides precise depth adjustments in 1/64-inch increments (view larger). 

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Powered by an 11 amp motor, this fixed base router features the micro-fine depth adjustment ring which provides precise, quick depth adjustments in 1/64-inch increments and constant switch and cordset location. An adjustable, tool-free motor cam lock and quick release motor latches provide easy depth change, quick motor pack removal and solid base locking. Precision-machined die-cast aluminum base; nickel-plated, die-cast aluminum motor housing; detachable cordset; dust-sealed switch; and a clear, Lexan sub-base provide enhanced durability. Rubber overmolded handles and low center of gravity design provide best-in-class comfort, balance, and control. Part of an interchangeable router system of two motor packs and three bases: fixed, plunge, and D-Handle. Includes 1/2-inch and 1/4-inch one-piece, self-releasing collets, two wrenches, and a concentricity gauge to ensure bit to sub-base centering.
